content.description: Controles t√©cnicos y procedimentales para protecci√≥n

back.definition: Educar usuarios sobre t√°cticas de ingenier√≠a social. Training obligatorio regular (trimestral/anual). Simulated phishing campaigns para medir efectividad. Reportar suspicious emails debe ser f√°cil y incentivado.
back.example: KnowBe4, Proofpoint awareness training. Simulated phishing: enviar fake phishing, track quien clicks. Gamification: badges por detectar phishing. Culture de 'see something, say something'.

back.definition: Incluso si atacante obtiene password via phishing, MFA bloquea acceso. Preferir: Push notification, FIDO2 hardware keys, TOTP apps. Evitar: SMS (vulnerable a SIM swapping).
back.example: Microsoft: MFA bloque√≥ 99.9% de account takeover attempts. Google: Security keys eliminaron phishing al 100%. Duo, Okta Verify, YubiKey. MFA obligatorio para email, VPN, critical apps.

back.definition: Procedimientos obligatorios para acciones sensibles. Wire transfers: callback verification con n√∫mero conocido. Password resets: verificaci√≥n multi-canal. Cambios de banking info: aprobaci√≥n presencial.

back.definition: Filtrado avanzado de email: anti-phishing, anti-spam, sandbox attachments, link analysis. Quarantine suspicious emails. Banner externo: marcar emails de fuera de organizaci√≥n.
back.example: Proofpoint, Mimecast, Microsoft Defender for O365. Link rewriting: reescribir URLs para scanear destino. Attachment sandboxing: detonar en ambiente aislado antes de entregar.
